Articles.Content:
I have been looking in to building a new computer for blender.

I have been looking for a graphics card that is under 200$ (300$ at max)

It seems based on this chart

https://docs.google.com/spreadsheet/ccc?key=0Atfi5YqN3LOqdEw2Rlcxa0RnZm4yY2tEMklINkJQbkE#gid=0

that gaming graphics cards prevail over workstation graphics cards.

What graphics card should I go for?

A 580?

A 590?

A 670?

A 570?

Or a 560?

I am starting to use blender more as you can see by my signature.
